package.name: Net_Sieve
package.summary: Handles talking to a sieve server.
package.description: This package provides an API to talk to servers implementing the managesieve protocol. It can be used to install and remove sieve scripts, mark them active etc.
package.notes: * Dropped PHP4 support, fixed PHP7 warnings

release.notes: * Remove erroneous and unnecessary active script caching (Bug #20472).
* Fix notices from non-static calling of PEAR methods. * Fix reading OK responses with string literal messages.
* Fix referrals if host data or user credentials are passed to connect() and login() instead of the constructor (Aleksander Machniak, Bug #17107).

* Query capabilities again after successful authentication (Jesse Crawford, Request #18382). * Escape quotes and backslashes in script names, and use literal strings for script names with non-ASCII characters (Aleksander Machniak, Bug #16691). * Work around broken STARTTLS behavior in Cyrus versions before 2.3.10 (Aleksander Machniak, Bug #18241). * Improve string literal parsing (Aleksander Machniak, Bug #18228).
* Add debug handler parameter to constructor. * Fix LOGIN authentication (Agust√≠n Eijo, Aleksander Machniak, Bug #17527).
* Fix SASL authentication without Auth_SASL (Bug #17489).
* Fix DIGEST-MD5 authentication with Dovecot (Stef Simoens, Bug #17320).

Changes since version 1.2.0b1: * Fix DIGEST-MD5 authentication (Aleksander Machniak, Bug #17285). * Don't try to call dl() if mbstring extension isn't loaded (Bug #17038).
